nodes.text: The Cliffhold meeting hall was a building in the spaceport city of Cliffhold on Iego. The hall was the meeting place for the Iego council, an organization that governed Cliffhold. During their mission to recover Reeksa root, Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker met with the Iego council in the meeting hall to convince them that the planet was being guarded by a Separatist LaserWeb Defense Station, not the malevolent deity known as Drol.
